name: Sat 1: 5 Mal 5
overview: A German language quiz game. There is an English version however, that was never released, but a rom is available for that version. In this game, based on a TV quiz show, two pairs play against each other in several rounds and are expected to guess a five letter word per round in just five tries. They only get the first letter as a default and can only get closer to the solution by using the same letters as in the words they use as a solution.
